sales.name: Jewelry Under $50
sales.description: It may feel like you’re stealing when you snap up items from our beautiful collection of jewelry under $50, but don’t worry — you won’t end up in cuffs. (Unless, of course, you're lucky enough to snag one of the opulent cuff styles here.) Other can't-miss finds include colorful cocktail rings, dangling earrings, and whimsical pendants — and that's just the beginning.

sales.name: Last Chance: Winter Apparel Up to 80% Off
sales.description: There’s still time to pick up stylish wintertime staples before spring hits — and the prices on these cold-weather items in this generous selection have been dramatically reduced. Today’s sale features essentials like belted peacoats and elegant wool numbers, along with cozy separates so chic they'll have you wishing for a few more months of winter.

sales.name: TRIA Beauty: Laser Hair Removal & Acne Devices
sales.description: When flawless, smooth skin is a necessity, our beauty buyers turn to the skin-care gurus at TRIA. Some of the brand's best products are on offer in this sale: The TRIA Hair Removal Laser, an FDA-cleared, at-home laser, gives you the same results you'd get with in-office treatments. The TRIA Blue Light is the ultimate acne treatment, guaranteed to give you clearer, smoother, blemish-free skin by reducing acne-causing bacteria at their source — so go on, get your glow on!

sales.name: Zoa
sales.description: Cut loose in Zoa’s voluminous yet body-conscious looks. Expect to find on-trend sequined sweaters, easy sweater dresses, jersey leggings, and playful jumpsuits — all the oh-so-comfortable pieces that put a twist on the basics.

sales.name: Handbags Under $175
sales.description: Clutches, satchels, crossbodies, totes. . . Every fashionable woman knows the power of the perfect handbag — which is why we've rounded up this can't-miss selection of our favorite picks. Ladies, bags that are big on style needn't be big-time investments!

sales.name: Watches Under $100
sales.description: Who’s got time to waste money on watches? Certainly not our wallet-savvy buyers, who’ve rounded up an (almost) unbelievable selection of timepieces that cost $100 or less. From Android to Timex, you’ll find the perfect accessory for your wrist. And with price points so low, who will fault you for buying two?

sales.name: Luxe Leather Seating
sales.description: Leather’s a dream material when it comes to furniture — it’s durable, classic, stylish, and luxurious at once. Here, take your pick of classic loungers and high-back chairs (some with ottomans, so you can really kick back). With details like turned wood legs and nailhead trim, many of these seating options exude bookish, timeless style. If you're into something more modern, there are plenty of sleek, sculptural selections as well.

sales.name: Gilt MAN Finds: Hollywood Icons by Sonic Editions
Blush Lingerie
sales.description: Edgy meets elegant, and smoldering meets sweet, in this one-of-a-kind sale. Whether you’re a lingerie aficionado or just looking for a flirty addition to spice up your intimates drawer, don’t miss this collection from Canadian lingerie brand Blush. Today’s offerings include barely-there thongs, lacy bras, and more — each piece is so alluring that you may never want to get dressed.

sales.name: Boot Rally: Up to 90% Off
sales.description: Time for a style reboot? This array of lace-ups, pull-ons, peep-toes, and zip-backs will take your winter and spring looks to new heights. Go for daring thigh-highs that pair perfectly with leggings, classic platform booties to offset chunky knits, and perennially chic peep-toes to go with skinny jeans. The best news? Your favorite designers have never been this affordable.

sales.name: Eileen Fisher
sales.description: For more than three decades, Eileen Fisher has reigned as the leader in everywoman style — her designs boast an elegant simplicity, and they look good on absolutely everyone. Don’t miss these layerable staples that are ideal for transitioning your look from winter to spring: V-neck box tops, cropped cardigans, chic pencil skirts, neutral shells, jewel-toned blouses, and more.

sales.name: George Stone Crab Claws
sales.description: From the ocean to your doorstep in less than 24 hours, these fresh (never frozen!) meaty claws are guaranteed to arrive in one piece. George and his team fish off of the Florida coast everyday and sustainably catch 3,000 to 5,000 pounds of stone crabs.

sales.name: See by Chloé
sales.description: See by Chloé, the younger spin-off of iconic French label Chloé, was launched in 2001 and quickly amassed a loyal following of trendsetters, including Natalie Portman and Rachel Bilson. Today’s coveted crop includes an eclectic array of imaginative dresses, girly blouses, pretty cardigans, and plenty more.

sales.name: Ava & Aiden
sales.description: We like to think of Ava & Aiden as Easy & Breezy — because looking stylish while wearing their shoes is a cinch. With warm weather on the horizon, it’s the perfect time to snap up a pair of their colorful and elegant styles, including cork-soled pumps, chunky espadrilles, as well as platform sandals and flats with a cute rope detailing. Simply dd a chic wrap dress, or jeans and a tee, or and you’ll be all set!

sales.name: Carlos Falchi
sales.description: You don't have to look far for a touch of the exotic — just see Carlos Falchi's Sex and the City-endorsed handbags, which are rendered in luxe python and microfiber zebra prints. These investment pieces strike a rare balance between downtown street cred and uptown luxury — and classic silhouettes keep them timeless, so you can be sure they'll never go out of style.

sales.name: Gold Hawk
sales.description: Style icons, take notice: This romantic collection of dresses, blouses, cardigans, and more by Los Angeles-based designer Michele Dahan is replete with luxurious fabrics and feminine frills (think lace, crochet details, sequins, and more). Take it from fans like Gwyneth Paltrow — there's no easier way to get instant star style than to rock one of these looks.

sales.name: Polarn O. Pyret Spring Styles for Baby & Kids
What to Wear to Work: Decoded
sales.description: Put an end to “What should I wear to work today?” with this sale, which includes all the basics for your job, from pencil skirts and fitted blazers to bolder blouses and dresses. The nine-to-five has never been more fashionable, thanks to Zac Posen, Calvin Klein Collection, Rachel Roy, and more.

sales.name: The Quilted Accessory
sales.description: This season, the quilted trend is getting a seriously stylish upgrade — and this sale is chock full of quilted pleasures. We've got luxe totes and shoulder bags adorned with edgy hardware, compact crossbodies in bright hues, and even laptop sleeves in animal-friendly faux leather.

sales.name: James Perse
sales.description: Perse’s super-soft cotton separates have inspired a feverish cult following, and it's easy to see why: They're as flatteringly tailored as they are effortlessly elegant. Slip into a selection of our favorites from the brand, including sweatshirt dresses that are easy as tees, as well as slouchy cargo pants, soft hoodies and cardies you'll want to wear every day.

sales.name: Wardrobe Essentials: Everything You Need
sales.description: Meet the components of classic, versatile style: the little bright dress, the statement blouse, the clean jean, the transitional scarf, the transitional shoe, the diamond accent, the perfect sock, and the carryall.

sales.name: Fine Jewelry Personal Shopping
sales.description:
Our Fine Jewelry Personal Shopping team is now available to offer one-on-one assistance in finding everything from classic investment pieces to one-of-a-kind designs not currently available on Gilt.com. To give you some idea of the kinds of gorgeous gems to which we have access, we’ve rounded up an amazing array of finds for your perusing pleasure, including multi-gem earrings, museum-worthy necklaces, and diamonds galore.

Looking for something you don’t see here? Contact our Personal Jewelry Shopping team at jewelryrequests@gilt.com or (855) 758-3765.
